q: Is this action codeblock 1) a step towards resolving the problems identified in the orientation block 2) simple 3) with appropriate tool use?
description: An action block that defines a function 'check_inventory' to check the current inventory in Nethack. The function uses the 'nethack' tool to send the key 'i' to open the inventory screen and then pauses for 1 second. The action is added to the weave-agent with the title 'Check inventory' and referencing the function name check_inventory.
